title: cmd/ld: link failure using cgo with Objective C
body:
by **vorakumar**: 
I am getting compilation error when I use cgo to compile objective-c code. I have it
completely working with go1.1beta2 but with go1.1 it started failing. I tried go1.1.1
today, and still no luck. 

Example: http://play.golang.org/p/xxDhGEirt5

I receive following errors:
(__DATA/__cfstring): unexpected reloc for dynamic symbol __CFConstantStringClassReference
(__DATA/__cfstring): unhandled relocation for __CFConstantStringClassReference (type 28
rtype 120)


I am not sure if I need to pass in any extra flags with go1.1 onwards. So, any help
would be much appreciated.
